com.sun.speech.engine.recognition

Class BaseRecognizerAudioManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.sun.speech.engine.BaseAudioManager
      • com.sun.speech.engine.recognition.BaseRecognizerAudioManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SpeechEventDispatcher, AudioManager

    public class BaseRecognizerAudioManager
extends BaseAudioManager
implements SpeechEventDispatcher
    Skeletal Implementation of the JSAPI AudioManager interface for Recognizers. Merely provides convenience function for calling the listeners.

    Actual JSAPI implementations might want to extend or modify this implementation.

    Version:
    1.2 01/27/99 13:43:57
    Author:
    Willie Walker

    • Method Detail

      • postAudioLevel

        public void postAudioLevel(Recognizer source,
                  float audioLevel)
        Utility function to generate AUDIO_LEVEL event and post it to the event queue. Eventually fireAudioLevel will be called by dispatchSpeechEvent as a result of this action.
        Parameters:
        source - the Recognizer causing the event
        audioLevel - the audio level between 0.0 and 1.0

      • fireAudioLevel

        public void fireAudioLevel(RecognizerAudioEvent event)
        Utility function to send a AUDIO_LEVEL event to all listeners.

      • postSpeechStarted

        public void postSpeechStarted(Recognizer source)
        Utility function to generate SPEECH_STARTED event and post it to the event queue. Eventually fireSpeechStarted will be called by dispatchSpeechEvent as a result of this action.
        Parameters:
        source - the Recognizer causing the event

      • fireSpeechStarted

        public void fireSpeechStarted(RecognizerAudioEvent event)
        Utility function to send a SPEECH_STARTED event to all listeners.

      • postSpeechStopped

        public void postSpeechStopped(Recognizer source)
        Utility function to generate SPEECH_STOPPED event and post it to the event queue. Eventually fireSpeechStopped will be called by dispatchSpeechEvent as a result of this action.
        Parameters:
        source - the Recognizer causing the event

      • fireSpeechStopped

        public void fireSpeechStopped(RecognizerAudioEvent event)
        Utility function to send a SPEECH_STOPPED event to all listeners.

      • dispatchSpeechEvent

        public void dispatchSpeechEvent(SpeechEvent event)
        Dispatch a SpeechEvent. This is a method from SpeechEventDispatcher. The dispatcher should notify all listeners of the speech event from this method.
        Specified by:
        dispatchSpeechEvent in interface SpeechEventDispatcher
        Parameters:
        event - the event to dispatch
